name: Optim Consultacy Services
description:
Optim Consultancy Services is a 7 Years old Enterprise application development and services company. Founded in 2009 and growing slowly with Client portfolios in USA, South Africa, Europe, Canada and Singapore.
Our clients ranges from Small Businesses and Enterprises across the Globe. OCS partners with Idea generators, Oracle and Mobility consulting Organizations to help them deliver proven and cost-effective services and Products. In a short span of time, we have established ourselves as a totally process driven organization with Partner’s Success and Growth as our primary goals.
OCS is today the principal service provider of Mobile Applications, ERP applications and Databases to a host of clients that range from emerging startups to well established organizations. Our some of the USPs are cutting edge technologies, Cloud Computing, Mobility.
We offer:
-     Enterprise Mobility
-    Agile Product Development
-    Solution Architecture and Design
-    Mobile Application Product Development and Implementation
-    Web Application Product Development and Implementation
-    Oracle eBusiness suite Development and Support
-    Technology frame work Development
